About me Portfolio
22 September 2015

Semantic role labeling using CRF

My very last undergraduate project for a class on advanced language modeling, where we discussed the theoretical foundations of hidden Markov models (HMM), the Viterbi and EM algorithm, log-linear models, maximum entropy models (MEMM), and as well as conditional random fields (CRF).

I finished the class with a short paper on Semantic Role Labeling using Linear-Chain CRF. The code is available on GitHub.

Til next time,
Melanie
